results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^(7*k-1))*(1 + x^(7*k-6)).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: nmax = 100; CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 + x^(7*k-1))*(1 + x^(7*k-6)), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 22 2017
